title: tuNai tandiDavE
sahitya:
tuNai tandiDavE vandu tunbamellAm tIra aNaiya vENumenai ayyanE murugA nI


anupallavi

  iNai undanukkillai inda ulagilengum innalurumanbarai inbura sheivadil


caraNam    sonda nalam tanai nADi sOrAdalaindODi enda vidamEnum kAsu ITTum Ashai vATTa
undan karuNai kUTTi uyyum tETTamurAdu nondu nalivOraip-pOl nondu nAn nalivurAdu
